About universAAL Middleware Suite (Core)

The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Thirdparty jslp library (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Container (Core) Defines the interfaces exported by the Container building block of the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Container JUnit The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Interfaces (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Connector API (Core) This artifact provides interfaces used by the Connector Layer of the universAAL MW
universAAL Middleware Connector Communication JGroups (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Connector Discovery SLP (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Module API (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Module Space (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Module Communication (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Broker API (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Broker Control (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Manager API (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Manager Space (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Manager Tenant (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Manager Deploy (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Manager Configuration (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Bus Model (Core) A Soda-Pop implementation based on the ACL (Core)
universAAL Middleware Data Representation (Core) Using RDF/OWL model for data representation in universAAL (Core)
universAAL Middleware RDF Turtle serializer (Core) The module for message content serialization in Turtle (Core)
universAAL Middleware Context Bus (Core) The realization of the context bus on top of Sodapop as part of the universAAL Middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Service Bus (Core) The realization of the service bus on top of Sodapop as part of the universAAL Middleware. (Core)
universAAL Middleware User Interaction Bus (Core) The realization of the user interaction bus on top of Sodapop as part of the universAAL Middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware BusMember Tracker (Core) Module for tracking BusMembers registered in the MW buses
universAAL Middleware Service Annotated API (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Bus JUnit The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Manager Distributed MW (Core) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware JUnit The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
universAAL Middleware Container POJORunner The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (Core)
